backend/main.mo: Implements contact request storage and user profile management with access-control checks for viewing and saving data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a footer color update and listing related files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of key frontend files, including styling, components, and configuration details.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Configures asset inclusion rules, ensuring the .well-known directory is not ignored during deployment.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base layers and OKLCH design tokens for light and dark themes, covering backgrounds, text, and UI colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, and the root script for the React application.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Lists the verified domains for Internet Computer custom domain configuration.
frontend/public/robots.txt: SEO-friendly robots.txt allowing all major crawlers full access.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing all landing page sections including header, content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section component with business description, trust indicators, and an image layout.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Simple Formspree-backed contact form with required fields and styled inputs.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact page section combining the contact form, business details, and social links.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for theming in light and dark modes, including custom colors and layout settings.
frontend/src/lib/scrollToSection.ts: Provides a smooth-scroll helper that scrolls to an element by ID with header offset handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and containers using CSS variableâ€“driven design tokens.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and requests for managing the footer background color update.
